__e: Hey, just because you've decided that me being the father is a shitty idea does not mean that I'm gonna get behind the even shittier idea of abandoning my son.
I'm really starting to think this is some fucked-up shit.
If this is such a fucking bad idea why'd you show up?
You made everybody sick, the whole fucking world.
It just makes me wonder what kind of fucking toilet world we live in.
They're born into this fucked-up world... by parents who are unwilling to even try to understand them!
